  • Method Details

    • buy

      @POST @Consumes("text/plain") @Path("/buy") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response buy​(@QueryParam("start") java.lang.String start, @QueryParam("end") java.lang.String end, @QueryParam("cant") int cant, @QueryParam("date") java.lang.String date, @QueryParam("id") java.lang.String id)
      Method for buying a ticket, and adding it to the stations The route was previous calculated by server and this method is just for confirmation of the purchase.
      Parameters:
      start - start station
      end - ending route.
      cant - amount of tickets to buy
      date - String format of the date of the purchase
      id - id of the customer
      Returns:
      Accepted code and the json format of the corresponding bill Internal server error if problems

    • getAllStations

      @GET @Path("/all") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllStations()
      Method for getting all the list of stations
      Returns:
      json format of the list of stations.

    • calcRoute

      @GET @Produces("text/plain") @Path("/calc") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response calcRoute​(@QueryParam("start") java.lang.String starting, @QueryParam("end") java.lang.String ending)
      Method for getting the calculation of a route, from a to b.
      Parameters:
      starting - Name of the start station.
      ending - Name of the ending station.
      Returns:
      the route, with the price and the stations to pass.
